languages.text: "Ни то, ни другое, Лорд-капитан. Вокс-трансляция была включена из ваших покоев, изнутри. Тем, кто... там был. Полагаю, госпожой Хейдари, если не вами. У меня нет полномочий прекращать ее, кроме случаев..." {n}В голосе Вигдис вкрадывается предательский шум, очень похожий на сдавленный смешок.{/n} "... случаев, когда вокс-трансляция угрожает безопасности корабля и экипажа".

"It was neither, Lord Captain. The vox-broadcast was initiated from inside your chambers. By someone who... was present there. I suppose, if it wasn't you, it must have been Mistress Heydari. I am unauthorised to terminate such broadcasts, except..." {n}A treacherous note creeps into Vigdis's voice, resembling a suppressed chuckle.{/n} "...except in cases where they explicitly jeopardise the safety of the vessel and her crew."
languages.original_text: "Ни то, ни другое, Лорд-капитан. Вокс-трансляция была включена из ваших покоев, изнутри. Тем, кто... там был. Полагаю, госпожой Хейдари, если не вами. У меня нет полномочий прекращать ее, кроме случаев..." {n}В голосе Вигдис вкрадывается предательский шум, очень похожий на сдавленный смешок.{/n} "... случаев, когда вокс-трансляция угрожает безопасности корабля и экипажа".

traits.locale_text: "It was neither, Lord Captain. The vox broadcast was initiated from inside your chambers. By someone who... was present in there. I suppose if was Mistress Heydari unless you enabled it yourself. I do not have the authority to terminate such broadcasts, except..." {n}A treacherous noise creeps into Vigdis's voice, sounding very much like a suppressed chuckle.{/n} "...for cases when they explicitly jeopardizes the safety of the vessel and her crew."

I'm unauthorised to terminate such broadcasts, except..." {n}A treacherous note creeps into Vigdis's voice, resembling a suppressed chuckle.{/n} "...except for cases when they explicitly jeopardise the safety of the vessel and her crew."

I'm unauthorised to terminate such broadcasts, except..." {n}A treacherous note creeps into Vigdis's voice, resembling a suppressed chuckle.{/n} "...except for cases when they explicitly jeopardise the safety of the vessel and her crew."

I am unauthorised to terminate such broadcasts, except..." {n}A treacherous note creeps into Vigdis's voice, resembling a suppressed chuckle.{/n} "...except in cases where they explicitly jeopardise the safety of the vessel and her crew."

"It was neither, Lord Captain. The vox-broadcast was initiated from inside your chambers. By someone who... was present there. I suppose, if it wasn't you, it must have been Mistress Heydari. I am unauthorised to terminate such broadcasts, except..." {n}A treacherous note creeps into Vigdis's voice, resembling a suppressed chuckle.{/n} "...except in cases where they explicitly jeopardise the safety of the vessel and her crew."

languages.text: « Ni l'un ni l'autre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. La diffusion-vox a été lancée depuis vos quartiers par quelqu'un qui... se trouvait là. Si ce n'est pas vous, j'imagine que c'était maîtresse Heydari. Je n'ai pas l'autorisation nécessaire pour interrompre ces diffusions, excepté... » {n}Une note perfide semblable à un gloussement étouffé se glisse dans la voix de Vigdis.{/n} « ... excepté dans les cas où elles mettent explicitement en danger la sécurité du vaisseau et de son équipage. »
languages.original_text: "It was neither, Lord Captain. The vox-broadcast was initiated from inside your chambers. By someone who... was present there. I suppose, if it wasn't you, it must have been Mistress Heydari. I am unauthorised to terminate such broadcasts, except..." {n}A treacherous note creeps into Vigdis's voice, resembling a suppressed chuckle.{/n} "...except in cases where they explicitly jeopardise the safety of the vessel and her crew."

traits.locale_text: « Ni l'un ni l'autre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. La diffusion-vox a été lancée depuis vos quartiers par quelqu'un qui... se trouvait là. Si ce n'est pas vous, j'imagine que c'était maîtresse Heydari. Je n'ai pas l'autorisation nécessaire pour interrompre ces diffusions, excepté... » {n}Une note perfide semblable à un gloussement étouffé se glisse dans la voix de Vigdis.{/n} « ... excepté dans les cas où elles mettent explicitement en danger la sécurité du vaisseau et de son équipage. »

languages.text: “都不是，舰长大人。音阵广播是从您的房间里发出来的，由某人……在那里的某人播放出来的。我猜，如果那个人不是您的话，就一定是海达利女士。我无权终止这种广播，除非……”{n}维格迪斯的声音不由自主地颤抖了一下，像是在努力憋笑。{/n}“……除非会对整艘舰船与船员的人身安全构成重大威胁。”
languages.original_text: "It was neither, Lord Captain. The vox-broadcast was initiated from inside your chambers. By someone who... was present there. I suppose, if it wasn't you, it must have been Mistress Heydari. I am unauthorised to terminate such broadcasts, except..." {n}A treacherous note creeps into Vigdis's voice, resembling a suppressed chuckle.{/n} "...except in cases where they explicitly jeopardise the safety of the vessel and her crew."

traits.locale_text: “都不是，舰长大人。音阵广播是从您的房间里发出来的，由某人……在那里的某人播放出来的。我猜，如果那个人不是您的话，就一定是海达利女士。我无权终止这种广播，除非……”{n}维格迪斯的声音不由自主地颤抖了一下，像是在努力憋笑。{/n}“……除非会对整艘舰船与船员的人身安全构成重大威胁。”

languages.text: "Weder noch, Lord Captain. Die Vox-Übertragung wurde aus dem Inneren Euer Gemächer heraus gestartet. Von jemandem, der ... dort zugegen war. Ich nehme an, wenn Ihr es nicht wart, muss es wohl Herrin Heydari gewesen sein. Ich bin nicht autorisiert, solche Übertragungen zu terminieren, es sei denn"{n}, ein linkischer Ton kriecht in Vigdis' Stimme, wie ein unterdrücktes Kichern,{/n} "Es sei denn, sie gefährden explizit die Sicherheit des Schiffs und seiner Crew."
languages.original_text: "It was neither, Lord Captain. The vox-broadcast was initiated from inside your chambers. By someone who... was present there. I suppose, if it wasn't you, it must have been Mistress Heydari. I am unauthorised to terminate such broadcasts, except..." {n}A treacherous note creeps into Vigdis's voice, resembling a suppressed chuckle.{/n} "...except in cases where they explicitly jeopardise the safety of the vessel and her crew."

traits.locale_text: "Weder noch, Lord Captain. Die Vox-Übertragung wurde aus dem Inneren Euer Gemächer heraus gestartet. Von jemandem, der ... dort zugegen war. Ich nehme an, wenn Ihr es nicht wart, muss es wohl Herrin Heydari gewesen sein. Ich bin nicht autorisiert, solche Übertragungen zu terminieren, es sei denn"{n}, ein linkischer Ton kriecht in Vigdis' Stimme, wie ein unterdrücktes Kichern,{/n} "Es sei denn, sie gefährden explizit die Sicherheit des Schiffs und seiner Crew."

languages.text: «Ninguno de los dos, Lord Capitán. La transmisión por voco se inició desde sus aposentos. Por alguien que... estaba presente allí. Si no fue usted, supongo que ha debido ser la señora Heydari. Estoy autorizada a finalizar transmisiones de ese tipo, excepto...». {n}La voz de Vigdis adquiere un tono traicionero, simulando una risa contenida.{/n} «... excepto en casos en los que se ponga en peligro la seguridad de la nave y su tripulación explícitamente».
languages.original_text: "It was neither, Lord Captain. The vox-broadcast was initiated from inside your chambers. By someone who... was present there. I suppose, if it wasn't you, it must have been Mistress Heydari. I am unauthorised to terminate such broadcasts, except..." {n}A treacherous note creeps into Vigdis's voice, resembling a suppressed chuckle.{/n} "...except in cases where they explicitly jeopardise the safety of the vessel and her crew."

traits.locale_text: «Ninguno de los dos, Lord Capitán. La transmisión por voco se inició desde sus aposentos. Por alguien que... estaba presente allí. Si no fue usted, supongo que ha debido ser la señora Heydari. Estoy autorizada a finalizar transmisiones de ese tipo, excepto...». {n}La voz de Vigdis adquiere un tono traicionero, simulando una risa contenida.{/n} «... excepto en casos en los que se ponga en peligro la seguridad de la nave y su tripulación explícitamente».

languages.text: 「それはどちらでもありません、ロード・キャプテン。ヴォクス放送は、陛下の部屋の中から開始されました。中にいた人物が…そうでなければ、おそらくヘイダリ女史によるものだったのでしょう。私には、そのような放送を終了する権限はありません。ただし…」{n}ヴィグディスの声に陰険なニュアンスが漂い、抑えられた笑い声に似ていた。{/n}「…船とそのクルーの安全を明示的に危険にさらす場合を除いては」
languages.original_text: "It was neither, Lord Captain. The vox-broadcast was initiated from inside your chambers. By someone who... was present there. I suppose, if it wasn't you, it must have been Mistress Heydari. I am unauthorised to terminate such broadcasts, except..." {n}A treacherous note creeps into Vigdis's voice, resembling a suppressed chuckle.{/n} "...except in cases where they explicitly jeopardise the safety of the vessel and her crew."

traits.locale_text: 「それはどちらでもありません、ロード・キャプテン。ヴォクス放送は、陛下の部屋の中から開始されました。中にいた人物が…そうでなければ、おそらくヘイダリ女史によるものだったのでしょう。私には、そのような放送を終了する権限はありません。ただし…」{n}ヴィグディスの声に陰険なニュアンスが漂い、抑えられた笑い声に似ていた。{/n}「…船とそのクルーの安全を明示的に危険にさらす場合を除いては」

languages.text: "İkisi de değil Lord Kaptan. Voks yayını, odanızdan başlatılmış. Orada bulunan biri tarafından. Bu kişi siz değilseniz Üstat Heydari olmalı. Böylesi bir yayını sonlandırmaya yetkili değilim. Tabii..." {n}Vigdis'in sesinde, bastırılmış bir gülüşü andıran bir ton sezinliyorsun.{/n} "Tabii geminin ve mürettebatının güvenliğini tehlikeye atan bir durum söz konusu olmadığı sürece."
languages.original_text: "It was neither, Lord Captain. The vox-broadcast was initiated from inside your chambers. By someone who... was present there. I suppose, if it wasn't you, it must have been Mistress Heydari. I am unauthorised to terminate such broadcasts, except..." {n}A treacherous note creeps into Vigdis's voice, resembling a suppressed chuckle.{/n} "...except in cases where they explicitly jeopardise the safety of the vessel and her crew."

traits.locale_text: "İkisi de değil Lord Kaptan. Voks yayını odanızın içerisinden başlatılmış. Orada bulunan biri tarafından. Sanıyorum bu kişi siz değilseniz, Heydari Hanım olmalı. Bu tip bir yayını sonlandırmaya yetkili değilim. Tabii..." {n}Vigdis'in sesinde bastırılmış bir gülüşü andıran bir ton sezinliyorsun.{/n} "Tabii geminin ve mürettebatının güvenliğini tehlikeye atan bir durum söz konusu olmadığı sürece."
